data.title: :: University Of Calabar ::
data.text: Makama, Lawrence Linus, currently a Lecturer II has been a Banker, a Lecturer with the Department of Management Sciences of the Kwararafa University, Wukari, Taraba state since 2015 before joining the services of the University of Calabar in 2018. He started his career with Union Bank of Nigeria PLC between 2011 and 2014 where he served in various Departments as required. He is currently a Ph.D Student with the Department of Business Administration of Nasarawa State University Keffi after completing his M/Phil with same department. He obtained his B.Sc and Master degree in Business Administration from the prestigious Ahmadu Bello University Zaria. Lawrence is a member of the MNIM - Member Nigerian Institute of Management (Chartered) 2010. Lawrence is a committed professional and has published widely in reputable academic journals in varying fields of management sciences and enjoys reading, traveling, sports and meeting new people.
